product_name: Canari Pro Tour Bike Jacket - Women's
long_description: Designed for aerobic cyclists, the Canari Pro Tour bike jacket converts easily to a vest or even a waistpack for the ultimate in versatility. Tightly woven polyester fabric resists wind yet maintains breathability, so you stay dry and comfortable. Zip-off sleeves easily convert the Canari Pro Tour bike jacket to a vest; further, garment also converts to a convenient waistpack tote, with elastic belt strap. Large back vent keeps air circulating. Droptail hem cinches with a drawcord to ensure full coverage. 1 zippered back pocket holds your gear. Canari Pro Tour jacket features zippered, mesh-lined hand pockets. Reflective hits increase visibility in low light.
short_description: Designed for aerobic cyclists, the Canari Pro Tour bike jacket converts easily to a vest or even a waistpack for the ultimate in versatility.
